content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 2, Granada CF 1.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 2, Granada CF 1.
Foul by Fran Rico (Granada CF).
Lucas Vázquez (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Anaitz Arbilla (Espanyol) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is too high. Assisted by Sergio García with a through ball.
Goal!  Espanyol 2, Granada CF 1. Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez with a cross.
Diego Mainz (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Sergio García (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Diego Mainz (Granada CF).
Piti (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Piti (Granada CF).

Youssef El-Arabi (Granada CF) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Anaitz Arbilla (Espanyol).
Diego Colotto (Espanyol) hits the bar with a header from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez with a cross.
Substitution, Granada CF. Diego Mainz replaces Jhon Córdoba.
Héctor Yuste (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Granada CF. Héctor Yuste replaces Manuel Iturra.
Substitution, Espanyol. Paco Montañés replaces Salva Sevilla.
Attempt missed. Salva Sevilla (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez with a cross.

Attempt missed. Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Salva Sevilla with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Fran Rico.
Substitution, Espanyol. Cristhian Stuani replaces Felipe Caicedo.
